profileAlternative.name: Arvind Jayaraman
profileAlternative.headline: Senior Machine Learning Research Scientist at KLA
profileAlternative.summary: Experienced Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the automotive software industry. Strong engineering professional skilled in Deep Learning, AI, GPU computing, MATLAB and Embedded systems.

aboutAlternative.text: Experienced Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the automotive software industry. Strong engineering professional skilled in Deep Learning, AI, GPU computing, MATLAB and Embedded systems.

positions.title: The MathWorks
positions.description:
I am a Senior Product Specialist Application Engineer at MathWorks. My primary area of focus is deep learning for automated driving. I have worked on a wide range of pilot projects with customers ranging from sensor modeling in 3D Virtual Environments to computer vision using deep learning for object detection and semantic segmentation. I have also contributed features to MATLAB including a support package to import popular deep learning networks from Caffe into MATLAB and features for the video ground-truth-labeling app for Automated Driving System Toolbox. I specialize in large-scale deployment of Automatic C/CUDA Code generation from Simulink and MATLAB for embedded software applications.
…
see more

roles.title: Senior Product Specialist for Deep Learning and Automated Driving

positions.title:
Title
Product Specialist Production Code Generation
positions.description: I specialize in Model Based Design and Automatic Code Generation for Embedded Software Systems. I work with customers to ensure that their Simulink and MATLAB algorithms can generate high quality production C Code. I work with companies to guide them on their design choice for models and tailor the generated code to meet their performance and readability needs.

positions.title: Graduate Student Instructor
positions.description: Graduate Student Instructor for EECS 461 Embedded Control Systems
